<?php
/**
 * Simple example gallery
 * 
 * This very simple gallery can contain up to 20 images. 
 * This content object class also demonstrates the drag & drop sorting possibilites
 *
 */
class PhenotypeContent_1601 extends PhenotypeContent
{

  var $content_type = 1601;

  // tab configuration
  var $_blocks = Array ("Properties", "Images 1-10","Images 11-20");
  var $_icons = Array ("b_konfig.gif", "b_items.gif","b_items.gif");

  /**
   * mark all images as visible on default
   * 
   * This method is always called when a new object of this type is created.
   *
   */
  function setDefaultProperties()
  {
    $this->set("bez", "Neue Galerie");
    $this->set("ddimageorder",Array());

    for ($i=1;$i<=20;$i++)
    {
      $this->set("view".$i,1);
    }
  }

  function init($row, $block_nr = 0)
  {
    parent :: init($row, $block_nr);


    switch ($block_nr)
    {
      case 0:
        $this->form_headline("Meta");
        $this->form_textfield("Name", "bez", 400);
        $this->form_richtext("Description", "desc", 405, 10);


        $_position = Array ();
        // First retrieve the last stored image order, but take only those which are still marked as visible
        foreach ($this->get("ddimageorder") AS $i)
        {
          $img_id = $this->getI("image".$i."_img_id");
          if ($img_id!=0 AND $this->getI("view".$i))
          {
            $_position[]=$i;
          }
        }
        // Then append images not yet in the position array
        for ($i=1;$i<=20;$i++)
        {
          $img_id = $this->getI("image".$i."_img_id");
          if ($img_id!=0 AND $this->getI("view".$i) AND !in_array($i,$_position))
          {
            $_position[]=$i;
          }
        }

        if (count($_position)!=0)
        {
          $this->form_headline("Images Order");
          $this->set("ddimageorder", $_position);
          $this->form_ddpositioner("", "ddimageorder", count($_position), "dd_thumb");
        }

        break;
      default:


        for ($i = 1; $i <= 10; $i ++)
        {
          $j = (($block_nr-1)*10)+$i;

          $this->form_headline("Image ". $j);
          $this->form_textfield("Title/Alt-Text", "titel". $j, 400);
          $this->form_textarea("Description", "text". $j, 400, 2);
          $this->form_image_selector("Image", "image". $j, "Gallery", 1);
          $this->form_checkbox("","view". $j,"view");
        }

        break;
    }
  }

  /**
   * Use thumbnail of the first image of this gallery as identifying thumbnail within the edit view
   * 
   * this method ist always called upon store after editing.
   */
  function attachKeyFields()
  {
    $img_id = $this->getI("image1_img_id");
    if ($img_id == 0){$img_id=4;}
    $this->setThumbnail($img_id);
  }

  /**
   * retrieve an Array with display information for all images of this gallery
   *
   * @return array
   */
  function getImagesArray()
  {
    $_images = Array();
    $i=0;
    foreach ($this->get("ddimageorder") AS $nr)
    {
      $_image = $this->getImageArrayForImageNumber($nr);
      if ($_image)
      {
        $i++;
        $_image["pos"]=$i;
        $_images[] = $_image;
      }
    }
    return ($_images);
  }

  /**
   * retrieve an Array with display information for image with given number
   */
  function getImageArrayForImageNumber($nr)
  {
    $img_id = $this->getI("image".$nr."_img_id");
    if ($img_id!=0 AND ($this->getI("view".$nr)==1 OR $visible==false))
    {
      $myImg = get_image($img_id);
      $_image = Array();
      $_params = Array("id"=>$this->id);
      $_image["nr"]=$nr;
      $_image["url_detail"]=$myImg->url;
      $_image["x"]=$myImg->x;
      $_image["y"]=$myImg->y;
      $myImg->selectVersion("thumb");
      $_image["url_thumb"]=$myImg->url;
      $_image["title"]=$this->get("titel".$nr);
      $_image["alt"]=$this->get("titel".$nr);
      $_image["text"]=$this->get("text".$nr);

      $_images[] = $_image;
      return $_image;
    }
    return false;
  }
  
  function getImageArray($pos)
  {
   $_posarray = $this->get("ddimageorder"); 
   $nr = $_posarray[$pos-1];
   return $this->getImageArrayForImageNumber($nr);
  }


  /**
   * Display thumbnail of an image drag & drop position i
   *
   * @param integer $i
   */
  function dd_thumb($i)
  {
    $img_id = $this->getI("image".$i."_img_id");
    $myImg = new PhenotypeImage($img_id);
    $myImg->display_thumb();
  }

}
?>
